content: this lovely rosabell cowl is quick and easy to make and uses less than one skein of yarn this pattern is one of the may contributions to the 2025 scarf of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 119 yds of a category 4 medium weight yarn i used lion brand made with love in the primrose hill colorway * size i 5 5mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
